sys_embedded_tour_step.content:
Discover a platform designed to connect people, share knowledge, and foster collaboration in a seamless and intuitive way.

In this guided tour, we’ll walk you through the key features of the portal, including:

Your Profile: Customize your information and manage your preferences.
News Feed: Stay updated with posts, updates, and interactions.
Groups and Communities: Join discussions and exchange ideas on topics that matter to you.
Private Messaging: Communicate directly with your colleagues.
Settings: Tailor your portal experience to meet your needs.

Click Next to start the tour or close this window to explore on your own. We’re here to make your experience unique and productive!
sys_embedded_tour_step.name: Introduction
sys_embedded_tour_step.title: Welcome to Our Social Network on ServiceNow
